text: Get three people to do a group selfie with you
Find someone wearing the same color as you and take a photo together
Get someone to teach you a dance move
Find someone with the same zodiac sign as you
Get three compliments from different people
Start a conga line with at least 4 people
Find someone who speaks another language and learn a phrase
Get someone to share their best party story
Find someone with the same birth month as you, which is not your partner
Exchange social media handles with three new people
Convince someone to sing a duet with you (no karaoke machine required)
Get someone to reveal their most embarrassing drunk story
Teach someone a silly dance move and get them to perform it in front of others
Find two people who've never met before and make them take a selfie together
Start a fake debate over an absurd topic (e.g., 'Is cereal a soup?') and get at least two people to join in
Get someone to share an unpopular opinion and defend it for one minute
Sneak a funny word (e.g., 'pickle', 'moonwalk', or 'unicorn') into three conversations without being caught
Convince someone to swap an item of clothing or an accessory with you for 10 minutes
Start a group cheer or chant without telling people why they're cheering
Get someone to tell you their color of their underwear
Learn the names of someone's grandparents
Drink from someone's drink, take a big sip
Put a name of someone in his pocket without them knowing
Put 3 cookies on someone
Give someone a riddle. They need to solve it
Get 6 people to yell "Eyali"
Get someone who doesn't know someone to cheer's for their (not real) birthday
Get another player to finish one of your sentences
Tell a joke and get another player to complete the punchline
Get another player to show you a scar on their body
Get another player to explain/talk about their tattoo
Get another player to tell a joke
Get another player to give you medical advice
Get another player to say something in a foreign accent
Get another player to tell you about their dream
Get another player to disagree with you over the color of something
Get another player to repeat themselves three times
Make up a word and get another player to ask what it means
Get another player to compliment your hair
Get another player to make an animal noise
Get another player to play Rock-Paper-Scissors with you (until you win)
Get another player to touch their own ears
Get a player to tell you about the worst present they ever received
Get another player to take a picture of yourself and message it to you
Get another player to say their favorite superhero
Get a movie quote wrong and get another player to correct you
Get a player to high-five you twice in one day
"Poison" another player by putting Gumi in their drink, they need to drink
Tell a player something is voice activated. Get them to try it
Get a player to do an impression of you
Get a player to say something in a different language
Make up a word and get another player to ask you what it means
